website_summaries.verdict: A great all-around teeter-totter with rotation that your kids can play on for years. Solid construction and bright colors make it a parent and kid favorite.
pros: Highly durable steel frame with 4 support feet
99 pounds per seat max weight limit

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd taken a picture. We had seven ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd taken a picture. We had seven kids on this thing, laughing and jumping trying to"win" the weight to their side. Ages 4-13, all having a blast. It's extremely well made. Putting together want the easiest thing but it wasn't that difficult either. The only complaint I can even come up with is that the hand holds can be twisted to make an awfully obnoxious sound, nothing a little fussing won't stop xD.
customer_reviews.author: Lea S

customer_reviews.title: My 3yr old and 5yr old LOVE this seesaw
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old and 5yr old LOVE this seesaw. It's the first thing they do in the morning and the last thing before the sun sets. They have hardly played with anything else since we gave it to them a week ago. The face that it rotates 360 degrees is the kicker. They spend most of the time spinning each other around versus going up and down. I had no idea it would be such a hit!!! Well worth the money. Only con: One black foam handle has already broken- but my 5yr old son is rough on things.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Brissett

customer_reviews.title: 3 and 5 year old love it
customer_reviews.text: I put this together with my grandkids, the little one putting the bolts in the holes and helping place the nuts and lock washers, the bigger one turning the allan wrench while I held the nut with the small wrench it comes with. It would have been easier if I had used a socket instead of the little wrench on the nuts but it came together well and is very sturdy. The top lifts off the base so that it's easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Birthday Party Hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: We put this together and put a huge bow in the middle and took it as a birthday gift to their backyard party!! Was a HUGE hit!!! All the kids loved it and the moms wanted to know where we got it. The kids at the party ranged from about 3 to 8 and they all loved it!! Definitely worth the money, very cute and colorful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Dom's Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: Our 5-year old and 2-year old grandkids love this teeter-totter. The 5-year old has long legs, so I hope they will continue to use it for awhile before she grows to tall. It stays in place without bracing it down, and it spins only as fast as the kids make it go.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rego

customer_reviews.title: Great seesaw, sturdy and so much fun.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this seesaw!!!! I have three year old twins and saw from other reviews that kids even 9 years old enjoy it. I put it together in about 45 minutes BUT the base is tricky. The four blue base bars are paired together and need to be aligned properly or the entire thing will be crooked. I had to redo that 3x, so just watch to make sure you do it right!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it! Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time (August 19th). Assembled by myself with the tools provided so it took me about 30 minutes instead of 15. The kids love it and use it everyday! They are 5 and 6 and move it around themselves. Double-check the screws once in a while and make sure plastic center insert is pushed in because it tends to slowly slide up after being used for a while. You just push it down by hand, even the kids can do it. We keep it outside none stop and have no problem with the rust yet. So far so good. Wish I found something like this before.
customer_reviews.author: MeMa

customer_reviews.title: It really is a great toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: We just got this yesterday and already my kids can't get enough. It really is a great toy for the price. That being said, I wish I would have slowed down when putting it together. The kids were so excited to get on this, that I didn't realize there are quite a few similar but different sized screws. I sort of skimmed the first part of the instructions and just started putting stuff together, only to realize that I used the wrong screws in random instance and had to take it apart and redo it. AGH. :) Still, this is a lot of fun and I really recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: jennyjeans

customer_reviews.title: The seesaw is good, but a couple more features would make it ...
customer_reviews.text: The seesaw is good, but a couple more features would make it better. The assembley is simply held to the base using gravity. This is what allows it spin 360. Having a lock to prevent it from coming up would be a good safety improvement. I worry what will happen if the kids get too crazy with it and it falls off. Also having some sort of spring or cushion under the seat would help prevent feet getting stuck under.
customer_reviews.author: Jimme Crocket

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for twins!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 4 year old twins, and it is fabulous!! It is easy to put together and the perfect size for preschoolers and school-age children. It's smaller size enables me to leave it indoors without taking up too much space when it is not used. The best part--it spins too. We've been using it for 2 months and we have had zero issues with it. Great product with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Raineri

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that this is really a good fit for an average sized three to four year ...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this is really a good fit for an average sized three to four year old. My nieces are six and on the smaller size and their feet drag the ground a bit. They still have fun on it, but it is really designed for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: deah

customer_reviews.title: They like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: The kids play on it almost every time they are in the backyard. They like it a lot, although they haven't quite mastered the spinning part yet. That feature seems a little awkward for them. The only thing I think it needs is some kind of stopper to keep the kids rear ends from crashing into the ground when someone bigger is on the other side. Props to the manufacturers - one likes to sit on the middle while two are on the seats and it has never yet pinched anyone's legs or rear ends.
customer_reviews.author: SC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this seesaw I really wanted to like it. It was made of a very durable medal and the color was so bright and inviting. The setup was relatively simple as well. I was able to put it together in 10 mins. with two demanding toddlers hounding me and a nerdy 9yr old begging for lunch. The downside is that there are no stoppers the twins foot got stuck underneath and it was hard for the shorter of the two to push back up.
customer_reviews.author: Charity T.

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this. Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. LOVE it. It is sturdy. They can spin around until they make themselves sick. It was easy to put together and easy to move if we need it to. I highly recommend this if you have twins or any 2 or more of similar sizes who love to spin and drop suddenly from the sky. My kids play on it at every chance they get.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's like a carnival in the house
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my small 7year old and 4year old. (they are about three same weight) Honestly, they get up wanting to play on it and play till they go to bed. I get dizzy watching them. Not to be left out my older boys take turns running the littles in circles to see how fast they can go. It's like a carnival in the house! Only issue is the panicky dad. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Angel Croyle

customer_reviews.title: ONLY for young kids! Weak materials.
customer_reviews.text: This item is definitely only intended for smaller kids. My 6 and 8 year old were playing it on and after only two days the metal based bent making it unusable. Shoddy materials. My girls don't weigh anything close to 99 lbs, in fact they don't even weight 99 lbs when added together. It should not have broken after only a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: SUZY

customer_reviews.title: a blast for the kids
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. only been playing on it a cpl wks now so i don't know how the long term will be. but my kids 11, 8,8, and 4 yrs old all have a great time on it i like how it goes in circles. I think it is worth the price we paid for it
customer_reviews.author: ll

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to our play area
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to our play area. Grand kids are 4 1/2 and 3 and in the little time we have had it up, their balance and core strength has improved as it rotates. It did take a couple of times of up, down and all around for them to get the hang of it (like don't fold your legs underneath). We are very happy with this seesaw.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Belland

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The Easter Bunny brought this for my girls this year. They are ages 4 and 5 and LOVE it!! It spins and goes up and down high enough that they have a a good time but not too high that it makes them nervous. It's very solid and I have no worries about it tipping over. I highly recommend this. It's light enough to move around so we'll be able to use it outside when it's nice out but can also use it inside when it's too hot.
customer_reviews.author: CSquared1020

customer_reviews.title: Spinning Seesaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality seesaw that spins very smoothly; my kids really enjoy playing on this. There tends to be a lot more spinning round than going up and down with this toy, but that's what I was looking for since I remember playing on a similar toy as a child (a Little Tikes airplane seesaw). It is very durable and the only improvement I can see would be a center seat; something I might add on my own. Would recommend this to anyone with small children age 2-8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jones5

customer_reviews.title: Seesaw Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old and 2 year old. Huge hit when we pull it out when friends come to visit. Easy to put together. Can be stored easily in 2 parts. Kids' favorite feature is besides going up and down, they can spin it in a 360 degree circle.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: ... a 2yr and 4yr old Grand children that just love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2yr and 4yr old Grand children that just love this thing, It is made for smaller children I beleive it was up to 90 lbs, I can see them out growing it by the time their 6 or 7 but for now thier having a blast..
customer_reviews.author: Knoxy

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because I thought it might be kind of fun for the kids, but I have to say, this has been the most popular item in our backyard. A neighbor got a larger seesaw shortly after us, but the kids keep coming back to ours because it spins in a circle. It doesn't tip over either. Very fun for the kids (mine are 2, 4, and 6 years old).
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this for our grandchildren they love it, I do recommend buying this seesaw
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for our grandchildren they love it, I do recommend buying this seesaw . We have had ours for seven months now it's made with great material holding up perfectly outside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this seesaw is so great! My 4 kids ranging from 3-11 years old ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely take the time to leave reviews, but this seesaw is so great! My 4 kids ranging from 3-11 years old love it! It does work out best when the kids are closely matched in weight, but the fact that it can spin and go up and down makes it versatile for a wide range of ages. It provides hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: golfshoe11

customer_reviews.title: well-made and fun..
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, well-made and fun...outdoors or in a larger playroom inside. It spins easily and quietly. The kids are not quiet while on it though. It was a hit for 2 little girls Age 4 and 2.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a quick add on to our outdoor play set and it was a hit. I really like that it's portable and can be moved around. The kids love that it spins and goes up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Kajean Secord-Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Kids went crazy
customer_reviews.text: What a fun gift! It was definitely a hit! The kids absolutely loved it. Easy to put together and fairly quickly, too. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Olson

customer_reviews.title: This thing spiiiiins sooo faaast
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE THIS THIG. HIGH quality. Seriously they spin on this faster than their fidget spinners...haha i make them wear a helmet! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great see-saw. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great see-saw. Sturdy, colorful and easy to put together. It's been outside all summer and still looks brand new. Perfectly safe for my grandsons, ages 3 and 4. And they love that it goes round and round, too. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Casas

customer_reviews.title: nice finish - good hardware
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and manufactured; nice finish - good hardware. Instructions clear and good packaging. This is our second purchase - first one for grandchildren 3 & 5 years old; this one for grandchildren 3 & 4 years old. Kids of unequal weight find ingenious ways of enjoying, like riding on their belly and using their feet to spin around. Good investment - should last a while!
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Fun times at Grandma's house!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids like playing on this, but it isn't the best on a smooth, hard floor. It moves all over the place unless it's on a carpeted area. Now that the weather is warmer, I may take it outside and try to anchor it down to the ground somehow. Their favorite way to play on it is the spinning!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Most fave toy in the backyard!
customer_reviews.text: We had the see saw for over five years and the kids still love it! Many times three at a time enjoy it :-)
customer_reviews.author: M. Adler

customer_reviews.title: We got this last summer and it's still in great shape- the kids love it and play with it ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this last summer and it's still in great shape- the kids love it and play with it often. The seesaw is very high quality and I would absolutely reccomend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mommysaver2010

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor and outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, my kids love that they can spin around. They have so much fan! Very recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jacky

customer_reviews.title: Check out awesome weight capacity
customer_reviews.text: I chose this for my daughter for her 4 year old birthday, and she loved it! See saws with my 2 year old, and loved the merry go round component. I loved the weight capacity on this, and see years of fun! Have had no issues with central steadiness, or tipping that I saw in other reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This item was a birthday present for my twins turning five. They both highly enjoy it and it seems durable enough for them. It was pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: cybratt

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a big success with my grandchildren, especially the 360 degrees rotation. It is very stable, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Dov Zandman

customer_reviews.title: grand kids like it but since it takes the cooperation of two ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the center pole could be a little higher and the seesaw would be a little more exciting for older kids but I still think it is a hit for our back yard....grand kids like it but since it takes the cooperation of two kids it can be a problem when one of the two doesn't want to ride....then they want Granny to be a substitute and that does not work so well
customer_reviews.author: bfbyrne

customer_reviews.title: This is good, and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is good, and well made. Definitely for small children though, maybe ages 2-4 years old. I have a 4 and 6 year old and it will be too small for them soon. They love it though, so we will get plenty of use out of it for a good year or two.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieP

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: wonderful for kids of all ages! My husband gets on this with the kids all the time. It swivels too. We live in the desert and it is out in the open sun for over 2 years now. It has held up great. The only thing I would suggest is maybe new handgrips after a year or so. They started to turn the kids hands black. Otherwise, My husband is 200 lbs and it holds him. We have kids from 2- 8 that love playing on it. The color never faded.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters age 4 and 2, LOVE this seesaw! They love it so much that their mom and dad moved it inside so they can play on it all the time! It’s twice the fun because it spins as well as goes up and down! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Becci H.

customer_reviews.title: I should of bought this when my kids were 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I should of bought this when my kids were 3 years old, but at 7 and 9, they are too big! :( Its ok though, I will donate it so my kids can see the gift of giving.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Family

customer_reviews.title: A merry go round too.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. Girls love the fact that it is a merry go round and not just a teeter totter.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good item for the kids...
customer_reviews.text: Grands were about 3 and 4 at the time... it was perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Too short, not steady.
customer_reviews.text: Too short for my 6 year old. Middle also comes off ground. Needs something to stake it into the ground to be steadier. Waste of my money unfortunately. We were so excited.
customer_reviews.author: CorKatSuzMil

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if they like the seesaw better or the fact it spins around
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters 5th birthday. What a HIT!! I don't know if they like the seesaw better or the fact it spins around! I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: I'm your reviewer :-D

customer_reviews.title: Fun together time
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 4 year old nieces are having a grand time using this seesaw. They go to parks frequently, but there are not many seesaws around anymore. It is a good cooperative outdoor activity that encourages them to work together and play together well.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty decent seesaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent seesaw. Very easy to put together. Just pay attention to the lengh of the screws and you wont have any issues. It swivels but not too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted a long time with a lot of use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful addition to any play set! I got this for my cousin’s son’s birthday YEARS AGO and it’s still functioning perfectly! It’s at grandma’s house where a lot of grandkids get to play with it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pajak

customer_reviews.title: All the parts were there and the instructions were simple and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Better than i thought i was getting for the price. I put it together Christmas day at my sons house. My grandsons played all day. Perfect addition to the backyard swing set
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for a five year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for five year olds birthday! Was a hit with all the kids. Best for 2=7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Hours of FUN!!!`
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our boys (ages 2 & 3). They LOVE it! It is a fun little teeter totter. Not only does it go up and down, it also spins around 360 degrees. My niece and nephew (ages 8 & 10) also came and played on it forever. I had to make them get off! LOL. It is a great purchase and I am really impressed with it, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SMRTME1979

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is cause the kids are just ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is cause the kids are just not interested in it that I didn't care for it. Or that it just makes my yard look trashy. It had about 10 mins of glory and the kids haven't touched it since.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail today - it was simple enough to put together and the kids already love it! I'm happy with the quality - and it being lightweight enough to transport around the yard/store easily when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price,  nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly and easy to store. The base pulls free from the top portion, we put the seats behind a door in the garage and the base on a shelve while waiting for Santa to bring it for Christmas. All metal parts make for a sturdy frame. Very happy with this purchase for my 3 and 1.5 year old boys
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a four and six year old and this seesaw is better for two year olds
customer_reviews.text: Having serious buyers remorse with this seesaw. I only bought it because it said that each seat had a weight capacity of 90 lbs; I have a four and six year old and this seesaw is better for two year olds. I would probably give another star if it was made better - my youngest can pick it up by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Arnesen

customer_reviews.title: Cute Seesaw - works best for kids around 3-4 - another toy my kids can fight over....
customer_reviews.text: Cute Seesaw - works best for kids around 3-4 - another toy my kids can fight over....
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay R.

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fun, fun, fun. Seven and six year old absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: RobertP

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely love this! They prefer to go round and round ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old twins for Christmas. They absolutely love this! They prefer to go round and round instead of up and down... lol, so that feature makes this seesaw perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. I always wondered how they can turn so fast without getting dizzy or falling off. Very easy to assemble. Strong and Durable. Being that it rotates, be careful that the top shouldn't come out of the base. It only happens when it is moved around the yard. But it is real easy to just put it back.
customer_reviews.author: IsiEMT

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for kids and they absolutely loved it. Great buy and it made all of the other kids, and their parents, jealous. Not kidding. Buy it if you like making your kids happy and busy for extended periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice seesaw, is level and low and spins balanced, is easy to move to different locations. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cindy62

customer_reviews.title: 2 and 6 year old boys love it and spend time on it all the time
customer_reviews.text: My kids, 2 and 6 year old boys love it and spend time on it all the time. Parental guidance is required for younger kids, but its awesom cons: light weight pros: easy to fix, hassle free, can be taken apart for storage and can be used indoors update: Even today, this is still in use, very much in tact, and even neighbors love it. kids line up to play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for me to put together. Not very high up when fully tilted, my 2 1/2 year old was fine all the way up and was not scare. The 360 ability is very nice. My 5 year old and 2 1/2 year old enjoy it even though they are different weights. Nice addition to any playground.
customer_reviews.author: Chavez14

customer_reviews.title: Great playground addition.
customer_reviews.text: run a daycare- kids love this seesaw. This is the second one I purchased because they all fight over it. Kids play on all day. Have lots of fun. Needs to be anchored down.
customer_reviews.author: dls

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this. It is also made to be sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. It is also made to be sturdy. Only drawback would be the flower washers. The wrench supplied tends to slip from time to time while trying to tighten the nut (flower washer surrounds the nut).
customer_reviews.author: History Fan

customer_reviews.title: ... set up in yard with the tent what a great plyground they have
customer_reviews.text: have this set up in yard with the tent what a great plyground they have
customer_reviews.author: American Plumbing

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected but lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just out this together in about 20 minutes & my kids love it! The 3 1/2 year old more than the 2 year old. I think it's a little too big for the younger one, but seems really well made & will be used for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Robicheau

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.text: It goes up and down and swivels. My grandchildren love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. 5 year old up to 11 have been on it all day. Easy to put together and the price was right. Its not too heavy so you can move it around.
customer_reviews.author: momazon

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy and my kids love to play on it
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with this seesaw for the price! It’s sturdy and my kids love to play on it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great item, grand kids love it and it was fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: L Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed with this! It’s very easy to assemble, easy to move around but very sturdy and well made. My 2 and 5 year old play on it together every day. I love the colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: OMG my kids can't get enough of this. Best investment I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DBG

customer_reviews.title: Love to watch how they work together to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, one for grampa's house and one for the grandkids house. Love to watch how they work together to get it spinning around. Easy and light to move place to place in the yard or to garage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Cram

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy my kids and the neighborhood kids loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy my kids and the neighborhood kids loves this so much... ages 3 to 11 year olds spend hours playing with it I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Grandchildren love this Seesaw, easy to put together. They play on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: My three kids (11, 7 and 3) LOVE this seesaw
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends LOVE this seesaw, especially the fact that it spins around. I especially like that you can relocate to any part in the yard, which is convenient when the gardener comes or we are hosting adults only. The price??? so inexpensive!!!!!!! A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Keinand

customer_reviews.title: Received the item and it was missing key parts so ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the item and it was missing key parts so we were unable to put it together. Hopefully the replacement has everything needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pennelope Nagelhout

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love it and it’s being 2 years and still look like new. Good Quality
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Great item especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great item especially for the price. Our daughters love this. It's very lightweight and easy to move anywhere, inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: larry e johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We don't necessarily hate the product, but since ours came with a missing base, we will never really know. We bought ours from: Warehouse Deals, Inc.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 4 and a 3 year old. They absutely love it. It is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seesaw for my godchild and he loves it. Setting it up was fairly easy and took all of 30 minutes. He loves it and it is a great outdoor toy to keep your little one entertained. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Was not pleased at all
customer_reviews.text: Was not pleased at all! It is so small it should be made for a small toddler. Not 100 pounds per seat like it says in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we have twin boys that are very destructive and well I have to say they love this thing its 2 years old and it works great Its not brocken and it has been outside for the 2 years in the wether and its still going strong. they can pull off the handles but oh well its still a great toy for little ones they have had it sence they where 3 and there 5 now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My kids (5 and 2) absolutely love this seesaw
customer_reviews.text: My kids (5 and 2) absolutely love this seesaw!! The older one spins the little one and they have so much fun together, it was the best Christmas gift they got.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: Is a snap to put together. Seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a snap to put together. Seems to be very well designed and strong. Cant wait to give it to my grand daughter. follow up.... now that my grand daughter has her see saw she cant stay off of it.. she loves it and it is perfect for her little two year old body..
customer_reviews.author: steven b

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at the quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our 6 year old twin granddaughters. I was amazed at the quality. It was easy to put together and the girls love it. They have been using it in the house and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: L. Raley

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters absolutely love this. I keep it put up in my ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters absolutely love this. I keep it put up in my garage. When they come to visit I just put the long piece in the base and it's ready for playtime in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tutorial on set up needed
customer_reviews.text: So I am a bit confused with the set up of this product it seems loose. How is it supposed to be set up. A tutorial video will be helpful, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dami G.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger. But my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. More fun than a barrel of monkeys. It is small, not over eighteen inches tall at the middle. Has about two foot lift at the seat. Well built, easy to assemble (less than30 minutes), made for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, took about 15-20 minutes. Really fun! I had two kids using it who were 5 pounds apart and they loved it. The fact that it spins makes it better than your basic teeter totter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on the item and have enjoyed using it
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Great deal on the item and have enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing kids crying!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the grown up sewsaw !! Today went to put it together for the kids that waited and waited !!!!! Three parts are missing !! One seat !! One arm and no hard ware !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: anna grant

customer_reviews.title: Hercules Seesaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren. They love this. They play on it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: my friends recommend this one and I'm glad we bought
customer_reviews.text: very durable product , my friends recommend this one and I'm glad we bought . kids love it. plus in my friends house it was outside all year round and no damage to it's looks of function.
customer_reviews.author: vori

customer_reviews.title: Pain to build, but fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a PAIN to build and already had one screw pop out of the seat so far. But kids love it and it's been a hit in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Maybritt

product_meta.title: Grow'n Up Heracles Seesaw, 360 Degrees Rotation Teeter-Totter, Backyard Playground Outdoor seesaw, Sturdy & Durable outdoor play
feature_bullets: Moves up and down with 360-degree rotation
Easy grip soft handle for small hands
Maximum weight of 99 lbs per seat
Recommended for ages 3 years and up
